answers.answer: I would like to know too. Going through this as well and I had preeclampsia last pregnancy.
I cant wait either...thank god im scheduled to get induced tuesday morning due to severe complications! Im so over the doctors and hospital

question: I am SO ready to have my little Peanut here! I have had such an amazing pregnancy, but the last 3 weeks have kicked my butt. I've been having contractions, but nothing to call my physician about. Between that, the swelling in hands & feet, & constant use of the bathroom, I'm ready.What "home remedies" did you mommas try that started labor?
title: FTM 37w 3d and I'm ready!
